languages.text: "Нет. Хочу сказать, чтобы ты не совершала ошибку, используя это устройство. Технологии друкари созданы, чтобы терзать и мучать — и ты сама была тому свидетелем. Уверена ли ты, что хочешь расстаться с собственной душой в обмен на то, чтобы избавиться от страха перед нашим с тобой проклятьем?"

"No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"
languages.original_text: "Нет. Хочу сказать, чтобы ты не совершала ошибку, используя это устройство. Технологии друкари созданы, чтобы терзать и мучать — и ты сама была тому свидетелем. Уверена ли ты, что хочешь расстаться с собственной душой в обмен на то, чтобы избавиться от страха перед нашим с тобой проклятьем?"

traits.locale_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「いや、この装置の使い方に誤りはないと言っておきます。デュカーリの技術は切断と拷問が目的…お前その目で見たとおりだ。自らの魂を手放すなど本気で言っているのか？我とお前が分かち合うこの呪いを恐れず生きるためだけに？」
languages.original_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"

traits.locale_text: 「いや、この装置の使い方に誤りはないと言っておきます。デュカーリの技術は切断と拷問が目的…お前その目で見たとおりだ。自らの魂を手放すなど本気で言っているのか？我とお前が分かち合うこの呪いを恐れず生きるためだけに？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “不，我是想告诫你，不要使用这个装置，不要铸成大错。黑暗灵族的技术设计之初，就是为了折磨与杀戮服务，你自己也亲眼见过了。你确定，你愿意舍弃一部分灵魂，就是为了不再惧怕你我都会面对的诅咒吗？”
languages.original_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"

traits.locale_text: “不，我是想告诫你，不要使用这个装置，不要铸成大错。黑暗灵族的技术设计之初，就是为了折磨与杀戮服务，你自己也亲眼见过了。你确定，你愿意舍弃一部分灵魂，就是为了不再惧怕你我都会面对的诅咒吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Non. Je veux vous implorer de ne pas commettre l'erreur d'utiliser cet appareil. La technologie drukhari est conçue pour mutiler et torturer, comme vous l'avez vous-même constaté. Êtes-vous réellement prête à vous défaire de votre âme dans le simple but de vivre sans le poids de la malédiction que nous partageons ? »
languages.original_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"

traits.locale_text: « Non. Je veux vous implorer de ne pas commettre l'erreur d'utiliser cet appareil. La technologie drukhari est conçue pour mutiler et torturer, comme vous l'avez vous-même constaté. Êtes-vous réellement prête à vous défaire de votre âme dans le simple but de vivre sans le poids de la malédiction que nous partageons ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No. No quiero que cometa el error de usar este aparato. La tecnología Drukhari solo sirve para mutilar y torturar; usted puede atestiguarlo. ¿Seguro que está conforme con desprenderse de su alma, únicamente para vivir sin miedo de la maldición que usted y yo compartimos?».
languages.original_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"

traits.locale_text: «No. No quiero que cometa el error de usar este aparato. La tecnología Drukhari solo sirve para mutilar y torturar; usted puede atestiguarlo. ¿Seguro que está conforme con desprenderse de su alma, únicamente para vivir sin miedo de la maldición que usted y yo compartimos?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Ich will Euch sagen, Ihr sollt nicht den Fehler machen, dieses Gerät zu benutzen. Drukhari-Technologie dient der Verstümmelung und Folter ... das habt Ihr selbst gesehen. Wollt Ihr Euch wirklich von Eurer Seele trennen, nur damit Ihr ohne Furcht vor dem Fluch leben könnt, die uns beide verbindet?"
languages.original_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich will Euch sagen, Ihr sollt nicht den Fehler machen, dieses Gerät zu benutzen. Drukhari-Technologie dient der Verstümmelung und Folter ... das habt Ihr selbst gesehen. Wollt Ihr Euch wirklich von Eurer Seele trennen, nur damit Ihr ohne Furcht vor dem Fluch leben könnt, die uns beide verbindet?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır. Sana o cihazı kullanma hatasına düşmemeni söylemek istiyorum. Drukhari teknolojileri, bozup acı vermek amacıyla tasarlanır. Sen kendin şahit oldun. Paylaştığımız lanetin korkusundan kurtulmak için ruhunu geride bırakmak istediğinden emin misin?"
languages.original_text: "No. I want to tell you not to make the mistake of using this device. Drukhari technology is designed to mutilate and torture — you have witnessed this yourself. Are you sure you are willing to part with your soul, just so you can live without fear of the curse that you and I share?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Sana o cihazı kullanma hatasına düşmemeni söylemek istiyorum. Drukhari teknolojisi bozmak ve acı vermek için tasarlanmıştır. Sen kendin şahit oldun. Paylaştığımız lanetin korkusundan kurtulmak için ruhunu geride bırakmak istediğine emin misin?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
